articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as Arsenal win at Brentford to move back to second in the Premier League.
articles.title: Arsenal move six points behind leaders Liverpool after win at Brentford - reaction

articles.description: Great Britain's hopes of reaching the United Cup semi-finals rely on Katie Boulter beating Iga Swiatek after Billy Harris loses to Hubert Hurkacz.
articles.title: United Cup: Great Britain's Billy Harris loses to Poland's Hubert Hurkacz before Katie Boulter plays Iga Swiatek

articles.description: With Bukayo Saka out until March, 17-year-old Ethan Nwaneri shows glimpses against Brentford to give Arsenal hope.
articles.title: Ethan Nwaneri impresses in Arsenal win against Brentford

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Schar, Merino, Salah, Diaz, Delap

articles.description: Chris Dobey comes from two sets down to beat former champion Gerwyn Price 5-3 and reach the PDC World Championship semi-finals for the first time.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Chris Dobey beats Gerwyn Price to reach semi-finals

articles.description: It is another significant year for the Lionesses as they look to defend their European title in Switzerland in July - but what shape are England's women in?
articles.title: Lionesses: What shape are defending champions England in for Euro 2025?

articles.description: Karl-Anthony Towns makes history as the New York Knicks defeat the Utah Jazz.
articles.title: NBA: New York Knicks extend winning streak with win over Utah Jazz

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Rangers vs Celtic in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Rangers v Celtic: Goalkeeper Jack Butland misses out on Old Firm derby because of internal bleed in leg

articles.description: LeBron James becomes the first person to play in the NBA as a teenager and past the age of 40.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James makes history as LA Lakers lose to Cleveland Cavaliers

articles.description: The Sugar Bowl between the US college football teams of Notre Dame and the University of Georgia is postponed following the New Orleans attack that killed 10 people.
articles.title: New Orleans attack: Allstate Sugar Bowl between Notre Dame and Georgia postponed
